name: Witch's Nest [inDev]
description:
Welcome to the Witch’s Nest! In a forest glowing with life, there are shadowy secrets lurking in its shroud. In the beauty and darkness, you will find friend and foe looking to create magic and mayhem. Each will bring Susi closer to the answers she seeks. Enter at your own risk. Follow her if you dare. There is no telling what you'll find within...

Release Date

Unknown, development is still in its early stages.

Music/OST The Team

Programmer: AGuyLikeMatt

Character Designer: Apatetite, EM54

BG Artists: Isabellbartnicki

Animators: Jade, Asmo, Ben

Music: Bradymuthmusic

Writers: Cael, Arcana Magister

Community Manager: SammieAran
